kobo_provider.hooks package

Submodules

kobo_provider.hooks.kobotoolbox module

class kobo_provider.hooks.kobotoolbox.KoboHook(kobo_conn_id: str, source=None)[source]

Bases: BaseHook

Interact with KoboToolBox.

Methods list:

  • get_form_ids: Allows to obtain the formid and the id_string of a form providing his formid or his id_string.

  • get_form_metadata: Gets the metadata of a form.

  • get_form_columns: Gets form columns.

  • get_form_submission: Gets the submissions or responses for a form.

conn_name_attr = 'kobo_conn_id'
conn_type = 'kobotoolbox'
default_conn_name = 'kobo_default'
get_form_columns(id_string: str) → dict[source]

This method gets all columns for a specific form

Parameters:

id_string (str) – id_string of a form.

Returns:

A JSON object (or python dict) with the form columns and their types.

get_form_ids(formid: int = None, id_string: str = None) → int[source]

This method allows to get a formid and id_string for a form, providing his formid or his id_string.

Parameters:

  • formid (int) – formid of a form.

  • id_string (str) – id_string of a form.

Returns:

This method returns the formid and the id_string for a form.

get_form_metadata(formid: int) → dict[source]

Retrieve metadata of a specific form.

Parameters:

formid (int) – Form ID to be fetched

Returns:

A JSON object (or python dict) with the form metadata.

get_form_submission(formid: int, last_id: int = None) → dict[source]

Retrieve submission of a specific form. You can specify “last_id” param that allows you to filter the sumbits with “_id” greater than the “last_id” specified

Parameters:

  • formid (int) – Form ID to be fetched

  • last_id (int) – Optional. filter the sumbits with “_id” greater than the “last_id” specified

Returns:

A JSON object (or python dict) with the form submissions.
